page.title: 19Clubs in Norwell
page.content: Numerous clubs cater for all age ranges in Norwell. There is a{Mum and {Toddlers}Club and an{Over 60's}Club who meet weekly. There are 2{Youth Clubs meeting weekly in the Old Church School. The{Young Farmers}meet at the 'Plough' on Tuesdays. Norwell has an {Under 12 football team}who play in the Newark Youth League at North Muskham and include boys from local villages. {Norwell Women's Institute}was formed in 1950. They meet on the first Wednesday in every month. The 40 members pay an annual subscription of Â£4. The W.I. aims to give women from surrounding villages the opportunity to meet and discuss any topic amongst themselves. Part of their{programme involves speakers on....The Origins of Surnames, Plastic surgery, History of Lace Making, Hot Air Ballooning, and Decorating Chocolate Eggs.
